description: A LegalBrief AI session where an associate asks the system to redact social security numbers and client names from a discovery dump, showing document retrieval, redaction, and version commit.

messages.content: You are LegalBrief AI, an autonomous assistant for drafting, reviewing, and revising legal briefs. You have access to the following tools: fetch_document, search_legal_db, summarize_case, generate_brief_section, redact_sensitive_info, validate_citations, commit_version. Follow user instructions, use tools as needed, and keep all privileged information redacted.

Hi LegalBrief, we just received the discovery dump for Doe v. Acme Corp. The file ID is "DISC2025-001". Please redact all social security numbers and client names before we share it with the litigation team.
Got it. I’ll first fetch the discovery dump, then redact the privileged data.

John Doe
Social Security Number: 123-45-6789
Address: 123 Main St, Anytown, USA

Witness Statement:
I, Jane Smith, SSN 987-65-4321, observed the incident on June 1, 2025. ...

[Additional pages of discovery containing numerous SSNs and client names]
I have retrieved the document. I will now redact all social security numbers and client names.
